column4: Hello, I've updated from hoary to breezy (using apt-get) and now I'm experiencing some problems. mainly, the system can't find some icons (like the gnome-home icon) and also nautilus looks really ugly (icons again) -- any ideas ?
grab a theme from gnome.org and it should dress things up\
is that something new ? (btw - what version of gnome does breezy have ?)
